description: This file is a shell script that initializes and starts the 'parodus' service, setting up environment variables, fetching hardware and image information, and executing the 'parodus' binary with specific parameters.

methods.name: get_hardware_mac
methods.description: Retrieves the device's MAC address without colons; attempts to read from system and fallback file.

methods.name: get_ImageName
methods.description: Extracts the image name from a version file based on a version tag.

methods.name: parodus_start_up
methods.description: Main function that gathers hardware info, constructs arguments, and starts the parodus process.
